title: Platform simplification mandate
summary: An explicit constraint to reduce tools, languages, and operational variation while modernizing.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Modernization often increases sprawl, creating a new platform that is harder to operate than BizTalk.
whenToUse: Teams are proposing many tools and frameworks
whenNotToUse: You are in early R&D with no operational commitment

gotchas: Exceptions become the norm without governance
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Standardize the common path (80%) and create a visible exception process for the rest.

complexity.rationale: Requires executive backing and governance discipline.
complexity.skillDemand: Architecture leadership plus platform product thinking.
complexity.toolingDemand: Standards repo, policy checks, and templates.

starterDiagram.title: Sprawl to standards
starterDiagram.description: Converge on a small set of approved paths.

realWorldExample.approach: Set an approved stack and limited patterns for initial waves.
realWorldExample.outcome: Lower run cost and faster onboarding.
